subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant carried the Lakers to their 15th title with a victory over the Magic in Game 5, finally shrugging off the shadow of Shaquille O’Neal, his former teammate.
snippet: Kobe Bryant carried the Lakers to their 15th title with a victory over the Magic in Game 5, finally shrugging off the shadow of Shaquille O’Neal, his former teammate.
